title: Dream
description: Avery Dover produces both legal and illegal drugs, with his brain.CORRD, A new branch of the government, in charge of the management of Orexin-A. Employs him to create one of them. A powerful medication that circumvents the very need for actual sleep.The other, he makes under the nose of that very organization. “Dream” users experience instantaneous dreams, and is used for its effects of euphoria and relaxation.What starts as a very small incident in Avery’s life, will end in a way that will change the life of millions.
author: Jeremy Waters
